replies.msg:
個實況就係咁嘅，如果你想有基本能力去砌 financial model，都可以唔洗太多數嘅，例如 equity model 咁，你需要有 advanced 少少嘅 econometric + accounting e.g. Forecasting/Financial accounting/VBA。但係如果你想砌 risk man model 咁你應該向 stat 方面走 e.g. survival analysis/stochastic process/time series/Basel accord。但係你想 structured product 嘅話，你應該要讀埋 mphil/pg 同埋向 maths/finance 方面行 e.g. fixed income/Mathematical finance/financial engineering/numerical analysis/probability theory。講到尾係 depend on 你做邊類 financial models。

其實就算唔係講 fintech/algo trade 你都要學基本 programming ，因為 financial models 係離唔開 programming。Fintech 都有好多種嘅，有啲 focus 係 DL，有啲 focus 係 crypto，都唔係 ug 可以 achieve 到嘅嘢黎。
